mainText: I send my condolences to his family . Stay strong stay focused and remember him as an innovator that changed how we use computers! I remember when the iPod came to the market. It changed the world, music, everything it was a ground breaker! The Apple family and Steve continued to change how to we use computers even until his last day! May god rest his soul and he'll always be remembered ! R.I.P MR APPLE (steve jobs).
author: Alex
